dcterms:description: The IMDb dataset was developed for sentiment classification where systems should classify the polarity of a given movie review as positive or negative. The dataset contains 50K labeled movie reviews.
dcterms:title: IMDb

dcterms:description: This dataset contains more than 5K tweets about three telecommunication brands for the task of churn prediction where systems should predict if a twitter post indicates user intention about leaving a brand.
dcterms:title: Churn
